check.title: Overview
check.description: This section shows the general problems detected when processing the code

check.title: PHP lint problems
check.description: This section shows php lint problems in the code detected by php -l

check.title: PHP coding style problems
check.description: This section shows the coding style problems detected in the code by phpcs

check.title: Javascript coding style problems
check.description: This section shows the coding style problems detected in the code by eslint

check.title: CSS problems
check.description: This section shows CSS problems detected by stylelint

check.title: PHPDocs style problems
check.description: This section shows the phpdocs problems detected in the code by local_moodlecheck

check.title: Update savepoints problems
check.description: This section shows problems detected with the handling of upgrade savepoints

check.title: Third party library modification problems
check.description: This section shows problems detected with the modification of third party libraries

check.title: grunt changes
check.description: This section shows files built by grunt and not commited

check.title: shifter problems
check.description: This section shows problems detected by shifter

check.title: Mustache template problems
check.description: This section shows problems detected in mustache templates

check.title: Gherkin .feature problems
check.description: This section shows problems detected in behat .feature files
